collection:
2.4 You agree to register for an Artsy account and to provide true and
accurate information in doing so.

You will not use the API to access, aggregate or
store any geographic location information associated with any User, or to
collect any User’s password or transaction or inquiry records.
sharing:
3.8 You will not transfer any data that you obtain through the API (including
but not limited to any User data, whether or not it is anonymous or
aggregated) to (or use any such data in connection with) any ad network, data
broker, or other advertising or monetization related service.
